content:
I've been trying to get https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/87337 working for a few months now and keep running into issues with the clippy tests. Would anyone be willing to help out with it?

The latest failure is the stderr file for ui/crashes/ice-3969.rs disappeared - the strange thing is that when I run nightly clippy-driver on that file, there's no output, so I'm not sure why the stderr file was there in the first place :/
oh well it would help if I hadn't added an allow there :face_palm:
